schools.name: Doctorate in Medicine (English) (FMS)
schools.description: This comprehensive program offers advanced clinical training, preparing students to become proficient medical practitioners with a strong foundation in medical sciences and patient care.

schools.name: Doctorate in Pharmacy (English) (FMS)
schools.description: Focused on pharmaceutical sciences and research, this program trains students in the development, production, and safe use of medications.

schools.name: Bachelor in Nursing Care, Polyvalent Nurse Option (ISSBP)
schools.description: This degree focuses on polyvalent nursing care, equipping students with the skills to provide comprehensive healthcare services.

schools.name: Preparatory Cycle for Industrial Management Engineering (EMINES)
schools.description: This preparatory program lays the groundwork for a career in industrial management engineering.

schools.name: Integrated Preparatory Cycle for Computer Sciences Engineering (BAC+5) (CC)
schools.description: A 5-year integrated program that immerses students in computer sciences.

schools.name: Architect Degree - BAC+6 (SAP+D)
schools.description: An architecture degree program that prepares students for professional practice.

schools.name: Bachelor in Hospitality Business and Management (English) (SHBM)
schools.description: A global business program focused on hospitality and management.

schools.name: Bachelor in Applied Economics (FGSES)
schools.description: An economics program that combines theoretical frameworks with real-world applications.

schools.name: Bachelor in International Relations (FGSES)
schools.description: A degree in international relations covering diplomacy, global governance, and international conflict resolution.

schools.name: Bachelor in Public Law (FGSES)
schools.description: This program provides students with a strong foundation in constitutional, administrative, and public international law.
